com.adobe.aem.init.dogmatix.http.handlers.modules.resources.storage

Class RemoteRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adobe.aem.init.dogmatix.http.handlers.modules.resources.storage.RemoteRepository
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Repository

    public class RemoteRepository
extends Object
implements Repository
    Represents a file repository on a file server accessible remotely via HTTP or HTTPs Parameters required to connect to a Remote Repository: Protocol : HTTP or HTTPS Host : hostname Port : port Context : context path Auth Credentials : userid, password Certificate : path to security certificate, alternative to auth credentials
    Author:
    vnagpal

      • lookup

        public FileInputStream lookup(String uri)
                       throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: Repository
        Gets the request file handle as an input stream. The caller method bears the responsibility of retrying the lookup in case of connection failure
        Specified by:
        lookup in interface Repository
        Parameters:
        uri - requested file path
        Returns:
        the file as input stream
        Throws:
        IOException - if not able to connect to the repo or if file not found

      • exists

               throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: Repository
        Checks for the existence of the specified file path Consumers should check for existence before any operation to avoid exceptions.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        uri - path to lookup
        Returns:
        true if a file exists at the specified location, false otherwise
        Throws:

      • delete

        public void delete(String uri)
            throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: Repository
        Deletes the specified file from the repo permanently. This action is irreversible and this method should be used with care and awareness especially when working with remote repos. If some repo extends the functionality of a soft delete and rescue, it must be implemented separately in the child class. Such methods, since not standard across all types of file storage, are not part of the top most ancestor in the class heirarchy
        Specified by:
        delete in interface Repository
        Parameters:
        uri - the path to delete
        Throws:
        IOException - if file does not exist at desired location or if not able to connect to the repo

        Description copied from interface: Repository
        Queries the repository for file info metadata.

        Parameters:
        uri - the path to get info for
        Returns:

        Throws:

      • lookin

        public FileInputStream lookin(String parentPath,
                     String fileName)
                       throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: Repository
        Convenience method to lookup a file within a folder. Gets the request file handle as an input stream. The caller method bears the responsibility of retrying the lookup in case of connection failure
        Specified by:
        lookin in interface Repository
        Parameters:
        parentPath - path of the folder to look in
        fileName - requested file
        Returns:
        the file as input stream
        Throws:
        IOException - if not able to connect to the repo or if file not found
